{{tt|std::to_chars_result}} is the return type of {{ltt std|cpp/utility/to_chars}}. It has no base classes, and only has the following members.

Compares the two arguments using {{lt|cpp/language/default comparisons}} (which uses {{c/core|1=operator==}} to compare {{tt|ptr}} and {{tt|ec}} respectively).
